name: Bottle Can Float
summary: Bottle Can Float is a relaxing casual game. In the game, you will select a bottle to go down the river. It will float freely along the flowing water. You can do You can influence the direction of the bottle by throwing small stones, and there are different small animals hidden in the river. You can make rafting more interesting by looking for these contents. I hope you can relax and have fun in the sound of gurgling water.
